attributes.action: VOTE of NO CONFIDENCE in the PRIME MINISTER and the CHANCELLOR
attributes.additional_details: It is time for the people of this once great land to make a stand and demand to have this Government held accountable for the economic destruction they are creating and for their refusal to consider alternatives. They need to STOP BULLYING our own citizens, STOP ALL SOCIAL WELFARE, HEALTHCARE , FREE HOUSING, to outsiders STOP FOREIGN AID and FREE us from the NON ELECTED DICTATORS of the E.U. we need a LEADER who will take back control of OUR own Country.  They NEED to resign NOW.
